name: the Dwarf
description:
• An exciting legendary world.
    It is a delightful world that contains various legends and mysterious events, exciting with mysterious underground dungeons and different designs.

  • Learn the story of the character and the game.
    See the world and the story through the eyes of the dwarf. By fortifying weapons along with mysterious enchantments, you can get the story and revenge.

  • A drama through the eyes of dwarves.
    Losing everything, dwarves embark on adventures and search for meaning. And under the leadership of Thaldoh, they never forget the day of vengeance.

  • Embark on your adventures in scary underground dungeons.
    In the dreadful underground dungeons, there may be demons and trolls that no one would have thought of. And challenge through the eyes of a little dwarf!

  • Upgrade your weapons.
    Mining and discovering precious gems. Upgrade your weapon with valuable enchantments and gems. Remember, only with weapons of the highest level can you challenge the darkness.
